document_data.name: ''Prismatic Cloak''
document_data.mainbody: e cloaks were found among the forces of [[Thultanthar]] in the [[Storm Horns]] as [[Harpers]] and [[Cormyr]]ean soldiers fought them around Archwizard [[Amskar]]'s new [[Amskar's enclave|glacier enclave]].
document_data.Description: The cloaks each had a distinct color, but shared the same design of having the lighter and darker shades of their color [[Wikipedia:Division_of_the_field#Common_divisions_of_the_field|''party per bend'']] across the cloak, with the shades reversed for the trim.
document_data.History: The cloaks were found among the forces of [[Thultanthar]] in the [[Storm Horns]] as [[Harpers]] and [[Cormyr]]ean soldiers fought them around Archwizard [[Amskar]]'s new [[Amskar's enclave|glacier enclave]].
